The Cannondale Trail SE 2 is the ultimate mountain bike for riders who demand the best in performance, durability, and style. With its lightweight aluminum frame, responsive suspension system, and top-of-the-line components, this bike is built to handle even the toughest trails with ease.


One of the standout features of the Trail SE 2 is its RockShox 35 Silver Fork, which provides 120mm of travel and smooths out even the roughest terrain. The SRAM SX Eagle drivetrain offers a wide range of gears for efficient pedaling on both climbs and descents, while the Shimano hydraulic disc brakes provide powerful stopping power for confident control.


The Trail SE 2 also comes with a dropper seatpost, allowing you to quickly adjust your saddle height on the fly to optimize your position for different trail sections. The WTB STX i25 TCS rims are tubeless-ready, providing a smoother ride and reduced risk of flats.


And with its eye-catching colors and sleek design, the Trail SE 2 is sure to turn heads both on the trails and off. Whether you're a seasoned rider looking to upgrade your gear or a beginner just starting to explore the world of mountain biking, the Cannondale Trail SE 2 is the perfect bike to take your riding to the next level.
